net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators
Class Norm

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.Calculator
        |
        +--net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators.Norm
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, ICalculator
public class Norm
extends Calculator
implements Constants

Calculates number of overridden methods for a class. Note that if the inherited method is abstract or if the method under investigation calls the superclass' implementation, it is not counted. A better name for this metric would be NumberOfReplaced methods. The reasons for not counting these is outlined on page 68 of the Lorenz and Kidd book "Object Oriented Software Metrics". Note that this calculator is now configurable from a preference page.

Author:
Frank Sauer
